mfa-push-welcome.title: Secure Your Account
mfa-push-welcome.description: In order to continue, install the ${appName} app via the app store from your mobile device.

mfa-push-enrollment-qr.pageTitle: Scan the code to log in using a push notification | ${clientName}
mfa-push-enrollment-qr.title: Secure Your Account
mfa-push-enrollment-qr.description: Scan the QR Code below using the ${appName} app on your mobile device.
mfa-push-enrollment-qr.enrollment-transaction-pending: You must scan the QR code with the ${appName} app on your mobile device.

mfa-push-enrollment-code.pageTitle: Copy the code to log in using a push notification | ${clientName}
mfa-push-enrollment-code.instructions1: Open the ${appName} app on your phone and tap "+" button.
mfa-push-enrollment-code.instructions3: Copy & paste this code to that screen
mfa-push-enrollment-code.title: Trouble scanning?

mfa-push-success.title: You're All Set!
mfa-push-success.description: We’re redirecting you to ${clientName} now. If you’re not redirected automatically, you can manually redirect yourself below.

mfa-push-challenge-push.pageTitle: Accept the push notification to log in | ${clientName}
mfa-push-challenge-push.title: Verify Your Identity
mfa-push-challenge-push.description: We’ve sent a notification to the following device via the ${appName} app:
mfa-push-challenge-push.challenge-transaction-pending: You must accept the notification via the ${appName} app on your mobile device.
mfa-push-challenge-push.polling-interval-exceeded: We have not received a confirmation, please slow down.
mfa-push-challenge-push.too-many-push: We have received too many notification requests. Wait a few minutes and try again.
mfa-push-challenge-push.transaction-not-found: Your enrollment transaction expired, you will need to start again.
mfa-push-challenge-push.mfa-push-verify-transaction-pending: We have not received a confirmation, please try scanning the code again.
mfa-push-challenge-push.mfa-push-verify-authenticator-error: We couldn't verify the enrollment. Please try again later.
mfa-push-challenge-push.mfa-push-challenge-authenticator-error: We couldn't send the notification. Please try again later.
